Package services

Class PlayerService

java.lang.Object
services.PlayerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerServiceI
public class PlayerService extends Object implements PlayerServiceI
A service class for managing player accounts and related operations. This service class provides methods for creating, retrieving, and managing player accounts, as well as performing financial transactions and checking account balances.
Author:
Gleb Nickolaenko
